        public void addToBucket(LabelPosition labelPosition,
               int bucketValue)
        Adds the passed LabelPosition to the bucket with the passed value.
        Parameters:
        labelPosition - The position of the Label to add to this bucket.
        bucketValue - The value of the bucket to add to. Must be between 0 and maxBucketValue().
